video.title: Frasier
video.synopsis: Frasier Crane is a snooty but lovable Seattle psychiatrist who dispenses advice on his call-in radio show while ignoring it in his own relationships.

episodes.synopsis: Seeking a fresh start following his divorce, Boston psychiatrist Dr. Frasier Crane returns to his native Seattle to host a radio call-in show.
episodes.title: The Good Son (Pilot)

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is on a quest for solitude, but can't find it.
episodes.title: Space Quest

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Niles decide to invite their father Martin out for an evening of fine dining at a swanky Seattle restaurant.
episodes.title: Dinner at Eight

episodes.synopsis: Local newspaper writer Derek Mann prints "I Hate Frasier Crane" in his daily column, which enrages and embarrasses Frasier.
episodes.title: I Hate Frasier Crane

episodes.synopsis: Frasier encourages Martin to start a hobby and gives him a telescope. While tinkering, Martin catches the eye of a bachelorette in the next building.
episodes.title: Here's Looking at You

episodes.synopsis: Frasier finds out renowned local artist Martha Paxton didn't paint a picture he has purchased.
episodes.title: The Crucible

episodes.synopsis: When a caller named Marco tells Frasier he's having problems committing to his girlfriend, Frasier advises him to break up with her.
episodes.title: Call Me Irresponsible

episodes.synopsis: Due to a canceled lecture, Frasier and Niles change their plans, but wind up at the same restaurant where their father is dining with an old friend.
episodes.title: Beloved Infidel

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is reluctant to do an on-air endorsement for a Chinese restaurant until he discovers how much money is involved.
episodes.title: Selling Out

episodes.synopsis: The rumor mill around the radio station is working overtime with the news that Bulldog is about to be fired.
episodes.title: Oops

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is upset when his father skips out on a doctor's appointment.
episodes.title: Death Becomes Him

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's Christmas spirit is dampened when he learns that his longawaited son Frederick won't be joining him for the holidays.
episodes.title: Miracle on Third or Fourth Street

episodes.synopsis: Martin invites Elaine over to the condo for an intimate dinner, and the next morning, he is unnerved to discover that she has spent the night.
episodes.title: Guess Who's Coming to Breakfast?

episodes.synopsis: As a favor to his father, Frasier agrees to take part in a celebrity bachelor auction.
episodes.title: Can't Buy Me Love

episodes.synopsis: While visiting Frasier's radio station, Martin hears Roz talk about being scammed by a local con artist.
episodes.title: You Can't Tell a Crook by His Cover

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is surprised to hear the voice of his ex-wife Lilith on his radio show. She tells him that she has come to town for a convention.
episodes.title: The Show Where Lilith Comes Back

episodes.synopsis: Niles comes to Frasier, seeking advice about his ongoing problems with his wife, Maris.
episodes.title: A Midwinter Night's Dream

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's agent Bebe informs him that he and Roz have been nominated for Seattle's annual broadcasting awards.
episodes.title: And the Whimper Is...

episodes.synopsis: Tired of their father's tacky plaid armchair, Frasier and Niles buy a new modern one and put Martin's chair in storage.
episodes.title: Give Him the Chair

episodes.synopsis: Frasier fears senility is just around the corner when he finds himself becoming forgetful about everything from Roz's name to his favorite songs.
episodes.title: Fortysomething

episodes.synopsis: Inspired by Roz to do some father-son bonding, Frasier invites his father on vacation.
episodes.title: Travels with Martin

episodes.synopsis: Niles is discouraged that his ideas for a psychiatric book have already been done.
episodes.title: Author, Author

episodes.synopsis: A bad bout with the flu lands Frasier in bed. Meanwhile, Roz becomes convinced that Gil is gunning for Frasier's premium time slot.
episodes.title: Frasier Crane's Day Off

episodes.synopsis: Over coffee at Cafe Nervosa, Niles poses an interesting question: After a year in Seattle, is Frasier happy?
episodes.title: My Coffee with Niles

episodes.synopsis: After Roz introduces Frasier to a hot new best seller, Frasier is stunned to learn the story was based on his longago affair with a former teacher.
episodes.title: Slow Tango in South Seattle

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's next-door neighbor, Mrs. Greenway, accuses Eddie of impregnating her precious Phoebe.
episodes.title: The Unkindest Cut of All

episodes.synopsis: After Daphne reveals her yearning for a new man in her life, Frasier vows to find the perfect match for her.
episodes.title: The Matchmaker

episodes.synopsis: When Frasier's car breaks down, the entire Crane crew hitches a ride with a pregnant taxi driver, Arleen, who suddenly gives birth.
episodes.title: Flour Child

episodes.synopsis: For years, Martin has been a regular at Duke's, a local watering hole that Frasier and Niles have never seen.
episodes.title: Duke's, We Hardly Knew Ye

episodes.synopsis: Another drizzly day in Seattle brings out the worst in Frasier.
episodes.title: The Botched Language of Cranes

episodes.synopsis: Political differences split the Crane family after Martin announces his support for radical right-winger Holden Thorpe on television.
episodes.title: The Candidate

episodes.synopsis: Frasier reveals his infatuation with Madeline Marshall, a stunning MBA who's been named one of the city's "hottest" women.
episodes.title: Adventures in Paradise: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Frasier and Madeline prepare for a romantic night in Bora Bora, Lilith and her new boyfriend coincidentally show up in the cottage next door.
episodes.title: Adventures in Paradise: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Maris checks herself into the hospital for some plastic surgery, Niles asks Frasier and Martin to join him in the waiting room for moral support.
episodes.title: Burying a Grudge

episodes.synopsis: Martin scoffs at Frasier and Niles for their inability to fix the most basic household appliance: the toilet.
episodes.title: Seat of Power

episodes.synopsis: After Roz accidentally collides with Bulldog in the hallway, she suffers an injured foot and must remain in bed.
episodes.title: Roz in the Doghouse

episodes.synopsis: Martin's obsession with an unsolved murder case is rekindled when he receives a call from the victim's mother.
episodes.title: Retirement Is Murder

episodes.synopsis: While chatting with Roz and Niles in Cafe Nervosa, Frasier discovers that someone has made off with his briefcase.
episodes.title: Fool Me Once, Shame on You. Fool Me Twice...

episodes.synopsis: Daphne endures the mockery of Frasier and Martin while listening to a tape of pop psychologist Dr. Honey Snow.
episodes.title: You Scratch My Book...

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is delighted to receive an unexpected visit from his Beantown buddy, Sam Malone.
episodes.title: The Show Where Sam Shows Up

episodes.synopsis: While searching for a missing book, Frasier slips into Daphne's bedroom for the first time since she moved in.
episodes.title: Daphne's Room

episodes.synopsis: When Niles may be tapped for membership in the ultra-exclusive Empire Club, Roz enters Frasier's name for the other open position.
episodes.title: The Club

episodes.synopsis: Frasier worries that loyal fan Kari is actually an obsessed stalker after she repeatedly calls him and sends gifts to his home.
episodes.title: Someone to Watch Over Me

episodes.synopsis: While discussing Roz's love life, Frasier realizes that Martin has never told Frasier he loves him.
episodes.title: Breaking the Ice

episodes.synopsis: While on the air, Frasier receives a call from Gretchen, who fears that her fencing instructor husband is having an affair with a wealthy new client.
episodes.title: An Affair to Forget

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is delighted with the raise he's been given in his new contract -- until his agent starts "consoling" him on the "slave wages" he's earning.
episodes.title: Agents in America, Part III

episodes.synopsis: When Frasier and Niles learn that one of their favorite restaurants is closing, they make reservations to dine there that evening.
episodes.title: The Innkeepers

episodes.synopsis: Martin's birthday party is anything but a piece of cake, and Roz is blue because she opted not to attend her family reunion in Wisconsin.
episodes.title: Dark Victory

episodes.synopsis: Frasier butts heads with the new station manager, Kate. When Kate wants to liven up his show, he views her ideas as lowbrow and refuses to concede.
episodes.title: She's the Boss

episodes.synopsis: When Frasier decides to join psychotherapeutic forces with his brother, Niles, and share an office, the two wind up fighting over everything.
episodes.title: Shrink Rap

episodes.synopsis: A death in the family puts the Crane men in a philosophical mood. Martin reveals that he's been secretly writing song lyrics for the past 30 years.
episodes.title: Martin Does It His Way

episodes.synopsis: After falling for yet another of Bulldog's practical jokes, Frasier asks station manager Kate to intervene -- but she urges him to retaliate on air.
episodes.title: Leapin' Lizards

episodes.synopsis: Frasier offers to host a wine-tasting event at his home. But to impress his fellow wine-club members, first he must rid of Martin's tacky armchair.
episodes.title: Kisses Sweeter Than Wine

episodes.synopsis: The staff is in an uproar after Kate nixes their annual raises. Frasier finds himself leading the employees' revolt, even though he is unaffected.
episodes.title: Sleeping with the Enemy

episodes.synopsis: The morning after Kate and Frasier succumb to their passion, they both have second thoughts about an office romance.
episodes.title: The Adventures of Bad Boy and Dirty Girl

episodes.synopsis: Maris is missing! When she's found on a New York shopping spree, Niles feels relieved until Frasier points out how inconsiderate it was of her.
episodes.title: The Last Time I Saw Maris

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's son is coming for Christmas! But when there's a mail-order mix-up, Frasier and Niles are forced to go to the mall in search of gifts.
episodes.title: Frasier Grinch

episodes.synopsis: Although they've agreed to stop seeing each other, Frasier can't get Kate off his mind. His family encourages him to let her know how he feels.
episodes.title: It's Hard to Say Goodbye If You Won't Leave

episodes.synopsis: Frasier realizes that he hasn't made any new friends since moving to Seattle. To remedy the situation, he makes an announcement on his radio show.
episodes.title: The Friend

episodes.synopsis: After Daphne's boyfriend is discovered sneaking out of the condo, Frasier gets uncomfortable with what Joe and Daphne are doing in her bedroom.
episodes.title: Come Lie with Me

episodes.synopsis: Seeing how upset Niles becomes when he reads about Maris's new romance in the society pages, Martin tells Niles it's time he started dating.
episodes.title: Moon Dance

episodes.synopsis: Diane Chambers re-enters Frasier's life when her play is to be staged in Seattle. Frasier denies any hurt feelings over having been left at the altar.
episodes.title: The Show Where Diane Comes Back

episodes.synopsis: Niles is ecstatic when Maris seeks his help after missing her court date for parking tickets. Niles sees the situation as a chance to win her back.
episodes.title: A Word to the Wiseguy

episodes.synopsis: In the spirit of the Leap Year, Frasier urges everyone to take a "leap" of their own.
episodes.title: Look Before You Leap

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is having "one of those days." Someone has taken his parking space; he's ignored by a clerk; and he's irritated by his neighbor's loud music.
episodes.title: High Crane Drifter

episodes.synopsis: Frasier buys a new, expensive chess set, and talks Martin into playing a game with him. After Martin wins again and again, Frasier becomes obsessed.
episodes.title: Chess Pains

episodes.synopsis: Niles is retained by the son of a millionaire to prove that his father is incompetent. Meanwhile, a lawyer representing the father meets with Frasier.
episodes.title: Crane vs. Crane

episodes.synopsis: Female police officer Maureen Cutler pulls over Frasier for speeding, but lets him off with a warning when she finds out that it's his birthday.
episodes.title: Police Story

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to score a syndication deal, Frasier agrees to help his new boss's fiancée to stop smoking. Too bad the woman is Frasier's agent, Bebe.
episodes.title: Where There's Smoke There's Fired

episodes.synopsis: Roz's biological clock is ticking, and she fears she'll never have children. Frasier advises her to start dating men who can offer her more than sex.
episodes.title: Frasier Loves Roz

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is on edge when he learns the station is conducting focus group research to learn what listeners think of his show.
episodes.title: The Focus Group

episodes.synopsis: To celebrate their third anniversary on the air, Roz gives Frasier a tape of their very first show -- which he soon remembers being a disaster!
episodes.title: You Can Go Home Again

episodes.synopsis: Daphne is surprised when her ex-fiance, whom she hasn't seen in five years, arrives in Seattle and wants to see her.
episodes.title: The Two Mrs. Cranes

episodes.synopsis: Although Frasier hates blind dates, he's pleasantly surprised when Roz fixes him up with her gorgeous friend Sharon.
episodes.title: Love Bites Dog

episodes.synopsis: Frasier tells Roz he's bored with the quality of the callers he's been counseling lately.
episodes.title: The Impossible Dream

episodes.synopsis: While out with Martin, Frasier and Niles unexpectedly spot one of their favorite writers -- a reclusive man named T.H. Houghton.
episodes.title: A Crane's Critique

episodes.synopsis: Niles agrees to pinch-hit for Frasier while he attends a convention of radio psychiatrists.
episodes.title: Head Game

episodes.synopsis: Daphne is devastated when her boyfriend Joe dumps her. When she tells everyone about her loss, Roz immediately jumps in to save the day.
episodes.title: Mixed Doubles

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's ex-wife Lilith summons him to Boston over Thanksgiving on a very important mission.
episodes.title: A Lilith Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Fed up with Frasier's insistence on paying for everything when they go out, Martin decides to treat his sons to dinner at their favorite restaurant.
episodes.title: Our Father Whose Art Ain't Heaven

episodes.synopsis: Martin's delighted reaction after his girlfriend Maureen breaks up with him surprises Frasier. He soon learns that Martin has also been dating Sherry.
episodes.title: Dad Loves Sherry, the Boys Just Whine

episodes.synopsis: Niles recalls how he and Frasier once pulled the school fire alarm and blamed it on a known troublemaker who was expelled as a result.
episodes.title: Liar! Liar!

episodes.synopsis: When Frasier becomes fed up with the strict rules governing his condo complex, he decides to attend his first condo association meeting.
episodes.title: Three Days of the Condo

episodes.synopsis: Frasier receives a call from a depressed woman, and relates the caller's problems to an incident that happened earlier in the week.
episodes.title: Death and the Dog

episodes.synopsis: To their delight, Frasier and Niles meet a pair of attractive women during one of their daily coffee breaks at Cafe Nervosa.
episodes.title: Four for the Seesaw

episodes.synopsis: Niles decides to move into a prestigious new building called the Montana.
episodes.title: To Kill a Talking Bird

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Niles spot Roz picking up roadside trash as part of a community service program.
episodes.title: Roz's Krantz and Gouldenstein Are Dead

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's son, Frederick, is coming to Seattle for a visit, so Frasier excitedly makes all sorts of plans.
episodes.title: The Unnatural

episodes.synopsis: A new on-air hosting spot opens up at the station, and Roz decides to go for it.
episodes.title: Roz's Turn

episodes.synopsis: To commemorate KACL's 50th anniversary, Frasier decides to re-create a live radio drama from the 1940s.
episodes.title: Ham Radio

episodes.synopsis: Frasier hosts the annual benefit for the Seattle Theatre Ensemble at his condo and convinces Niles to attend.
episodes.title: Three Dates and a Breakup: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Niles are delighted that their father has finally "come to his senses" and called it quits with Sherry.
episodes.title: Three Dates and a Breakup: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: There's a heat wave in Seattle, and an ailing Frasier can't seem to escape a "wave" of rising tensions all a round him.
episodes.title: Daphne Hates Sherry

episodes.synopsis: To cheer up his brother, Frasier urges Niles to see his divorce as a new beginning, but Niles is unable to put a positive spin on the situation.
episodes.title: Are You Being Served?

episodes.synopsis: When asked if he thinks Niles and Maris are meant to be together, Frasier is stumped.
episodes.title: Ask Me No Questions

episodes.synopsis: On Roz's birthday, Frasier decides to surprise her with dinner for two at Toscana, Seattle's most romantic restaurant.
episodes.title: Odd Man Out

episodes.synopsis: While visiting Mexico, Frasier meets a beautiful supermodel named Kelly Easterling and the two have a red-hot fling.
episodes.title: Frasier's Imaginary Friend

episodes.synopsis: Martin's 65th birthday is quickly approaching, and everyone wants to make it a memorable event.
episodes.title: The Gift Horse

episodes.synopsis: Niles hosts a Halloween costume party to benefit the Library Association. The guests are asked to dress as a character from literature.
episodes.title: Halloween

episodes.synopsis: The day after Niles's fateful Halloween party, Frasier asks Roz what she plans to do now that she knows she's pregnant.
episodes.title: The Kid

episodes.synopsis: Seattle is abuzz with plans to celebrate the 1,000th broadcast of Frasier's radio show.
episodes.title: The 1,000th Show

episodes.synopsis: Roz persuades Frasier to appear as a "celebrity guest" on a cruise ship so they can get a free trip to Alaska.
episodes.title: Voyage of the Damned

episodes.synopsis: When Frasier tries to return a gift he purchased at a snobby boutique, the clerk at the store gives him a hard time.
episodes.title: My Fair Frasier

episodes.synopsis: Frasier returns from a fabulous weekend with his high-powered girlfriend Samantha and regales Niles with stories of all the celebrities they met.
episodes.title: Desperately Seeking Closure

episodes.synopsis: Martin is roped into playing a singing wise man at a church Christmas pageant, but he wants to keep the performance a secret from Daphne.
episodes.title: Perspectives on Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's social life is in the doldrums, so Daphne takes pity on him and invites him to join her for a drink at her favorite British pub.
episodes.title: Where Every Bloke Knows Your Name

episodes.synopsis: When Daphne finds an engagement ring in Martin's underwear drawer, she immediately informs Frasier and Niles.
episodes.title: Ain't Nobody's Business If I Do

episodes.synopsis: With contract negotiations drawing near, Frasier learns that Roz has hired his shark-like agent Bebe Glaser to broker her new deal.
episodes.title: The Zoo Story

episodes.synopsis: In a final effort to save his marriage, Niles begins weekly counseling sessions with Maris and Dr. Bernard Schenkman.
episodes.title: The Maris Counselor

episodes.synopsis: Roz is thrilled to win a weekend ski package -- until she realizes she can't maneuver down a mountain in her advanced state of pregnancy.
episodes.title: The Ski Lodge

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is shocked when Lilith reveals that her new husband has left her -- for another man.
episodes.title: Room Service

episodes.synopsis: For years, a family feud has separated Frasier, Martin and Niles from their Greek relatives, who live on the other side of town.
episodes.title: Beware of Greeks

episodes.synopsis: KACL hires handsome physician Dr. Clint Webber to host a new call-in radio show.
episodes.title: Perfect Guy

episodes.synopsis: While discussing the upcoming SeaBeas radio awards at Cafe Nervosa, Frasier, Roz and Bulldog witness a crime.
episodes.title: Bad Dog

episodes.synopsis: Is it wrong to continue seeing a woman you have nothing in common with except great sex? That's the question Frasier asks himself.
episodes.title: Frasier Gotta Have It

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's plans to spend a quiet night at home are interrupted by the news that Martin expects Frasier to accompany him to a relative's wake.
episodes.title: First Date

episodes.synopsis: While her apartment is being painted, Roz and her baby bunk at Frasier's place.
episodes.title: Roz and the Schnoz

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to make a love connection, Frasier and Niles throw a big singles' party at Niles's apartment.
episodes.title: The Life of the Party

episodes.synopsis: Frasier meets a lovely woman named Tricia. The trouble is, every time they make a date, Frasier is late, and Tricia has had it with him.
episodes.title: Party Party

episodes.synopsis: Frasier enlists Daphne's aid in protesting the demolition of his favorite bookstore. But when the police move in, Frasier takes off.
episodes.title: Sweet Dreams

episodes.synopsis: When Frasier appears to be in denial over losing his job, Niles, Roz and Martin join forces to bring him back to reality.
episodes.title: Good Grief

episodes.synopsis: Frasier dreads the idea of attending his high school reunion, which always seems to coincide with a downturn in his life.
episodes.title: Frasier's Curse

episodes.synopsis: Niles isn't too thrilled at the prospect of his father moving in until he realizes that Daphne is part of the package.
episodes.title: Dial M For Martin

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Niles will stop at nothing to get tickets to the hottest play in town.
episodes.title: Hot Ticket

episodes.synopsis: Frasier suspects that his gorgeous new girlfriend is just using him to get free psychiatric advice.
episodes.title: First, Do No Harm

episodes.synopsis: Frasier has begun dating Nancy, a former co-worker. One day after playing squash with Niles, Frasier finds a gift tucked into his workout bag.
episodes.title: Secret Admirer

episodes.synopsis: Having made clear to Maris that their marriage is over, Niles incurs his estranged wife's wrath: She repossesses his car and cuts him off financially.
episodes.title: How to Bury a Millionaire

episodes.synopsis: As a finalist in his gourmet club's Golden Apron elections, Niles must host an elegant dinner party. Frasier offers to hold the event at his condo.
episodes.title: The Seal Who Came to Dinner

episodes.synopsis: Rumors that KACL may be ditching the new format and rehiring the talk staff comes as welcome news to Roz, who tells Frasier she's strapped for cash.
episodes.title: Roz, a Loan

episodes.synopsis: While Christmas shopping with Roz, Frasier buys his son, Frederick, who's half-Jewish, a menorah for the holidays.
episodes.title: Merry Christmas, Mrs. Moskowitz

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's excited that his son, Frederick, will be spending his birthday in Seattle -- yet a series of events shakes Frasier's faith in humankind.
episodes.title: Good Samaritan

episodes.synopsis: Roz's mother is visiting, and after a few days, Roz yearns to have a little time to herself. Frasier suggests they fix her up with Martin.
episodes.title: Our Parents, Ourselves

episodes.synopsis: While Roz copes with the unwanted affections of a nerdy co-worker named Noel, Frasier takes a call during his show from his Boston buddy.
episodes.title: The Show Where Woody Shows Up

episodes.synopsis: In the first of three Valentine's Day vignettes, Niles prepares for a date with the president of his wine club.
episodes.title: Three Valentines

episodes.synopsis: After Maris's powerful legal team postpones their divorce court date for another eight months, Niles realizes it's time to hire a new lawyer.
episodes.title: To Tell the Truth

episodes.synopsis: Niles's lawyer, Donny, negotiated Maris's lakefront cottage as part of their divorce settlement. Yet Donny's romance with Daphne is blossoming.
episodes.title: Decoys

episodes.synopsis: Eager to get to know the Ashbys, a prominent society couple, Frasier throws a lavish dinner party. But the date conflicts with Martin's poker night.
episodes.title: Dinner Party

episodes.synopsis: During his cash-draining divorce proceeding, Niles was forced to sublet his apartment. Now that the divorce is final, Niles is anxious to move back.
episodes.title: Taps at the Montana

episodes.synopsis: At a charity auction, Niles places a bid for a private lunch with three Nobel Prize winners, but soon finds himself in a bidding war with Frasier.
episodes.title: IQ

episodes.synopsis: Buoyed by the success of Frasier's call-in show, the station searches for a second radio "shrink" to hire.
episodes.title: Dr. Nora

episodes.synopsis: Over breakfast at the Crane condo, Martin and Daphne meet Frasier's latest conquest, a voluptuous blonde who's in charge of publicity at the station.
episodes.title: When a Man Loves Two Women

episodes.synopsis: While Roz tries to come up with a gift to thank Niles for doing her a favor, Martin tells Frasier he saw Donny buying an engagement ring for Daphne.
episodes.title: Visions of Daphne

episodes.synopsis: Lonely and miserable, Niles visits one morning and runs into a trio of lovebirds: Frasier and Faye; Martin and Bonnie; and of course Daphne and Donny.
episodes.title: Shutout in Seattle: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: To Roz's chagrin, she can't seem to break off her sexual fling with Bulldog. To her horror, Bulldog begins courting her.
episodes.title: Shutout in Seattle: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Frasier starts dating Mia Preston, a children's book author. Everyone except him realizes she is the spitting image of his and Niles's mother, Hester.
episodes.title: Momma Mia

episodes.synopsis: Fed up with meeting losers, Niles decides to try a dating service. Meanwhile, Daphne has had it with her mother's interference in her wedding.
episodes.title: Father of the Bride

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is repeatedly made the butt of phone pranks by KACL's new comedy team, "Carlos and the Chicken."
episodes.title: Radio Wars

episodes.synopsis: Frasier becomes jealous when Niles lands a job as an art critic for a magazine.
episodes.title: Everyone's a Critic

episodes.synopsis: After losing his job at KACL, Bulldog is delivering pizzas. Seeing how well he gets along with Alice, Roz offers him a job as a babysitter.
episodes.title: The Dog That Rocks the Cradle

episodes.synopsis: No one at the station can stand the owner's airhead daughter, Poppy, but Niles finds himself taken with her.
episodes.title: Rivals

episodes.synopsis: The rift between Martin and his sons' tastes is bridged when they find they are all fans of "The Antiques Roadshow."
episodes.title: A Tsar Is Born

episodes.synopsis: A minor fender-bender sends Frasier to the hospital. While waiting, Niles hears the name of Maris's plastic surgeon and decides to confront him.
episodes.title: The Late Dr. Crane

episodes.synopsis: Lilith and Frederick come to Seattle for Thanksgiving dinner with the Cranes. Frederick maneuvers his parents into spending an evening together.
episodes.title: The Apparent Trap

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is seized with crippling back pain. Niles suggests it is a stress injury, and while recovering, Frasier muses aloud about why he's unhappy.
episodes.title: Back Talk

episodes.synopsis: Daphne is unsure how to deal with Niles's feelings for her. Roz assures her there's nothing to worry about.
episodes.title: The Fight Before Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Frasier tells Roz about his family's adventure on the Millennial New Year.
episodes.title: RDWRER

episodes.synopsis: All the on-air personalities are writing jingles to introduce their shows. Frasier typically overdoes when crafting his.
episodes.title: They're Playing Our Song

episodes.synopsis: Frasier runs into his unrequited high school crush, Lorna. The courtship gives Frasier a chance to live the high school glory days that he never had.
episodes.title: Big Crane on Campus

episodes.synopsis: Frasier plans to introduce himself to a beautiful woman he has seen at the opera, but brings Martin along to the opera so as not to look lonely.
episodes.title: Out with Dad

episodes.synopsis: Frasier hires Mary, a young producer, to fill in for Roz. Mary starts taking over the show, but Frasier is hesitant to object, because she's black.
episodes.title: Something About Dr. Mary

episodes.synopsis: Frasier begins to think that Niles's new girlfriend may be slightly manipulative, a suspicion that is brought to the forefront.
episodes.title: Whine Club

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Roz share a room at a broadcasting conference, which is notorious for being a meet market.
episodes.title: Hot Pursuit

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's show is pulled off the air for a week as leverage against him in his contract negotiations with the station.
episodes.title: Morning Becomes Entertainment

episodes.synopsis: Frasier learns his comely neighbor Regan is available again, but he's too shy to approach her, because he looked foolish in their previous encounters.
episodes.title: To Thine Old Self Be True

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is honored to have his caricature hung on the wall of his favorite Italian restaurant, but is less than pleased with the likeness.
episodes.title: Three Faces of Frasier

episodes.synopsis: In a session with her therapist, Daphne recalls (through flashbacks) a series of unfortunate events following the surprise shower.
episodes.title: Dark Side of the Moon

episodes.synopsis: Daphne's wedding is approaching, and Niles becomes even more apprehensive when he and Mel decide to take a trip together.
episodes.title: Something Borrowed, Someone Blue: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: On the night before Daphne and Donny's wedding, Niles realizes he isn't over Daphne, and decides to tell her how he feels once and for all.
episodes.title: Something Borrowed, Someone Blue: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: After Niles and Daphne run out on her wedding, they return to face their jilted lovers. Donnie and Mel, meanwhile, each seek some sort of revenge.
episodes.title: And the Dish Ran Away with the Spoon: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The tension of Donnie's lawsuit and Mel's demand that Niles and Daphne not be seen in public together erupts in a major fight.
episodes.title: And the Dish Ran Away with the Spoon: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Frasier uses his father as a pawn to date the owner of a home for senior citizens. Niles and Daphne plan a picnic, but get separated.
episodes.title: The Bad Son

episodes.synopsis: Frasier adopts the role of cultural mentor to Todd Peterson, a Silicon Valley billionaire who's just become the station's new owner.
episodes.title: The Great Crane Robbery

episodes.synopsis: Frasier hires a butler to take over for Daphne's housekeeping duties, now that she is Niles' girlfriend. Mel unexpectedly shows up at Frasier's house.
episodes.title: Taking Liberties

episodes.synopsis: Frasier hires an attractive lawyer, Abigail Michaels, to handle his lawsuit with Donnie, but he suddenly drops the lawsuit.
episodes.title: Legal Tender Love and Care

episodes.synopsis: Roz introduces Frasier to her new boyfriend, Luke, and the two men hit it off. After Roz dumps Luke, Frasier continues being friends with him.
episodes.title: The New Friend

episodes.synopsis: Frasier butters up the local morning TV host to let him co-host the Seattle Christmas parade with her, but she comes down with food poisoning.
episodes.title: Mary Christmas

episodes.synopsis: When Frasier receives a prestigious award, his mentor from Harvard, Professor Tewksbury, sends him a note -- which Frasier proceeds to overanalyze.
episodes.title: Frasier's Edge

episodes.synopsis: Frasier decides that the three generations of Crane men should head out to the woods for some family bonding, despite the others' protests.
episodes.title: Cranes Unplugged

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Niles realize their helplessness when Frasier's car stalls, so they enroll in an auto repair night class. They quickly fall behind!
episodes.title: Motor Skills

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Niles try to reawaken the career of an actor they saw perform when they were young. When they see him again, they realize he is awful.
episodes.title: The Show Must Go Off

episodes.synopsis: Frasier goes to a speed-dating event and asks Roz what he should wear, remarking that the slightest decision can have far-reaching effects.
episodes.title: Sliding Frasiers

episodes.synopsis: Kenny arrives at Frasier's place in a panic after unwittingly making a date with a woman even though he's married. Frasier agrees to go in his place.
episodes.title: Hungry Heart

episodes.synopsis: Frasier receives tickets to the Sonics game and goes with Martin and Niles. Niles is selected to attempt the halftime half-court shot!
episodes.title: Hooping Cranes

episodes.synopsis: Roz gets the green light to put on a show about outer space, and Frasier agrees to narrate. The two fail to come to grips with their reversed roles.
episodes.title: Docu.Drama

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Niles throw a party to try to convince Penelope, the trustee of a foundation, to donate money to the failing prep school they attended.
episodes.title: It Takes Two to Tangle

episodes.synopsis: Niles has just been re-elected as the "corkmaster" of his wine club. Shortly after the inauguration, Frasier announces his resignation from the club.
episodes.title: Forgotten But Not Gone

episodes.synopsis: Roz shares her interest in writing children's books with Frasier, sparking him to reminisce about when he and Niles used to write their own stories.
episodes.title: Daphne Returns

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is about to leave the apartment and meet his mentor for an informal therapy session when Niles and Daphne return from a day of kickboxing.
episodes.title: The Wizard and Roz

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Niles go to an electronics store to buy a DVD player for Daphne. There they meet a beautiful woman, and Frasier is instantly smitten.
episodes.title: Semi-Decent Proposal

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is tutoring Lana's son, Kirby, in history, which he agreed to do only because Lana promised to set Frasier up with her friend, Claire.
episodes.title: A Passing Fancy

episodes.synopsis: Roz borrows Frasier's BMW to take her daughter out for a day at the zoo. Will Frasier erupt after finding out what they've done to his car?
episodes.title: A Day in May

episodes.synopsis: Frasier has a dream about Claire, but is rudely awoken by Lana. When asked about his relationship with Claire, Frasier says they're going on a trip.
episodes.title: Cranes Go Caribbean

episodes.synopsis: On vacation in Belize with Martin, Niles, Daphne, and his new girlfriend Claire, Frasier finds himself frequently thinking about Lana.
episodes.title: Don Juan In Hell: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Disappointed over losing Lana, Frasier also has to contend with his family's disapproval over his breakup with Claire.
episodes.title: Don Juan In Hell: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Daphne accidentally discovers that Heather, a patient, is in love with Niles.
episodes.title: The First Temptation of Daphne

episodes.synopsis: Niles and Daphne separately surprise each other with concert tickets. However, the rub is that both concerts are on the same night.
episodes.title: The Return of Martin Crane

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is upset when he sees graffiti in the bathroom at work that implies he's a snob.
episodes.title: Love Stinks

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is throwing a Halloween party, telling his guests to come dressed as their hero. He is dressed as Sigmund Freud and has invented a party game.
episodes.title: Room Full of Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Frasier realizes he has lived with Martin longer than any of his romantic relationships have lasted.
episodes.title: Bla-Z-Boy

episodes.synopsis: Frasier celebrates his 2,000th show by airing bloopers as he waits impatiently for Bill Gates, his special guest for the anniversary.
episodes.title: The Two Hundredth Episode

episodes.synopsis: Frasier promises an internship at the station to Lucius, a young man who is very much like Frasier himself. However, another applicant gets the job.
episodes.title: Sharing Kirby

episodes.synopsis: Frasier has some radio competition -- Dr. Zach -- and his show takes a dip in the ratings.
episodes.title: Junior Agent

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is disappointed after receiving a message from Roz that Martin will not be able to join him for dinner because he's working overtime.
episodes.title: Bully For Martin

episodes.synopsis: Niles and Daphne decide to move in together in Niles's house. Martin bemoans the end of an era, but he is glad to see Daphne and Niles so happy.
episodes.title: Mother Load: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Niles and Daphne decide to move in together in Niles's house. Frasier celebrates a victory over obnoxious upstairs neighbor Cam Winston.
episodes.title: Mother Load: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Kenny is concerned with Frasier's lack of younger listeners and tries to convince him to go on "Teen Scene," one of the station's other shows.
episodes.title: Juvenilia

episodes.synopsis: Niles takes Frasier and Martin to pick out an engagement ring for Daphne. Frasier and Niles disagree on styles and Martin gets fed up.
episodes.title: The Proposal

episodes.synopsis: When Frasier gets a message that Lilith's conniving brother Blaine is in town, Frasier plans to avoid him.
episodes.title: Wheels of Fortune

episodes.synopsis: Roz argues with Daphne and Niles over who will allow Frasier to tag along with them that evening. It seems he can't do anything by himself anymore.
episodes.title: Three Blind Dates

episodes.synopsis: Roz gives Frasier a lucky penny for Frederick's competition in the National Spelling Bee, but Frasier doesn't want Freddy to think he needs luck.
episodes.title: War of the Words

episodes.synopsis: When Frasier and Niles learn that the house they grew up in is for sale, they decide to visit it for old times' sake.
episodes.title: Deathtrap

episodes.synopsis: Eddie is sick, and Martin tries to make him feel better with food.
episodes.title: The Love You Fake

episodes.synopsis: Niles is furious when Frasier uses the younger Crane's childhood bed-wetting trauma to comfort Jeremy, a radio show caller.
episodes.title: Cheerful Goodbyes

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Roz prepare to spend a week broadcasting from Spokane. Frasier is concerned when Roz reveals that she and Roger have broken up.
episodes.title: Frasier Has Spokane

episodes.synopsis: The family gathers to celebrate Daphne's birthday. The festivities are dampened by Mrs. Moon's bitterness over her husband's leaving her.
episodes.title: The Guilt Trippers

episodes.synopsis: Niles travels to England to convince Daphne's father, Harry, to reunite with Daphne's mother, Mrs. Moon, who is with Daphne in Seattle.
episodes.title: Moons Over Seattle

episodes.synopsis: An emotional Daphne and Niles exchange their heartfelt, personal wedding vows at the Lucky Seven chapel in Reno.
episodes.title: The Ring Cycle

episodes.synopsis: Frasier drives Niles to the mall. Right after pulling into the parking garage, Frasier realizes the clock is wrong and he's late for his radio show.
episodes.title: Enemy at the Gate

episodes.synopsis: Frasier wants to be the condo board president, but knows he'll never win after getting on the board members' nerves. So he convinces Martin to run.
episodes.title: Proxy Prexy

episodes.synopsis: Roz's critical cousin Jen arrives in town from London. Jen remembers Roz from her wilder days and is convinced she is the only cool person in Seattle.
episodes.title: Kissing Cousin

episodes.synopsis: Bulldog plays the ultimate Halloween prank on Frasier by towing his BMW, replacing it with a smashed up vehicle ... and catching his reaction on tape.
episodes.title: Tales From the Crypt

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's son Frederick is having his bar mitzvah in Boston and asks Frasier to give a short speech at the ceremony.
episodes.title: Star Mitzvah

episodes.synopsis: Interviewing housekeepers turns into a difficult task when Frasier realizes that no one can fill Daphne's shoes.
episodes.title: Bristle While You Work

episodes.synopsis: Prepped and gowned, Niles awaits bypass surgery as his loved ones surround him. When Maris calls to wish him well, he begs the nurse to sedate him.
episodes.title: Rooms With a View

episodes.synopsis: The gang throws a party for Niles when he returns home after his heart surgery. After his brush with death, Niles talks about his new zeal for life.
episodes.title: Don't Go Breaking My Heart

episodes.synopsis: Hosting the family Christmas Day gathering has long been Frasier's honorary privilege. Now, Niles and Daphne want to host the festivities for their first year as a married couple and Frasier openly objects to Niles trying to steal his thunder.
episodes.title: We Two Kings

episodes.synopsis: Frasier accidentally gets his neighbor Cam Winston's mail and is intrigued by an exclusive invitation to a mysterious locale.
episodes.title: Door Jam

episodes.synopsis: Financial analyst Julia Wilcox, who's famous for having given poor investment advice, is hired to do a stock market report during Frasier's show.
episodes.title: The Harassed

episodes.synopsis: Lilith unexpectedly comes to town to talk to Frasier about an important matter, while Martin makes every effort to dodge her.
episodes.title: Lilith Needs a Favor

episodes.synopsis: When Niles acquires a valuable painting, Frasier plans a party to celebrate the unveiling. Yet Frasier's track record for such events is catastrophic.
episodes.title: Daphne Does Dinner

episodes.synopsis: After losing the squash tournament nine years in a row, Niles drops Frasier and teams up with another partner, Jim.
episodes.title: Trophy Girlfriend

episodes.synopsis: KACL is holding a bike-a-thon to raise money for AIDS research, and Frasier is pressured into participating. Daphne thinks it's a great idea.
episodes.title: Fraternal Schwinns

episodes.synopsis: Kenny is struggling with depression. Frasier offers to refer him to a good psychiatrist, but Kenny will discuss his problems only with Frasier.
episodes.title: Kenny on the Couch

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Niles are eager to impress their guests at an upcoming social event with the best caviar, but are unwilling to fork out the hefty price.
episodes.title: Roe to Perdition

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is coaxed into building a house for Habitat for Humanity with his co-workers. He turns out to be more of a burden than a help.
episodes.title: Some Assembly Required

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's charming accountant friend from college moves to Seattle and sends Frasier into a penny-pinching frenzy after evaluating his finances.
episodes.title: Farewell, Nervosa

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Phil McGraw is in Seattle. Though he and Frasier are old friends, Frasier's still bitter with him for swindling him out of $200 in a poker game.
episodes.title: The Devil and Dr. Phil

episodes.synopsis: A friend of Martin's wife visits the Cranes. He instantly bonds with Frasier and Niles as they share uncanny similarities -- to Martin's concern.
episodes.title: Fathers and Sons

episodes.synopsis: Julia tells Frasier that she ended the affair with his friend Avery; she thinks he used her to get his hands on the software that she's developing.
episodes.title: Analyzed Kiss

episodes.synopsis: Roz trains the dreadfully incompetent Noel as her replacement.
episodes.title: A New Position for Roz

episodes.synopsis: Roz's resigns from KACL and complains to Niles about her new job. Despite giving Frasier an ultimatum, Roz denies that she's in love with him.
episodes.title: No Sex Please, We're Skittish

episodes.synopsis: Inspired to turn over a new leaf, Frasier takes Niles's romantic advice and "commits to commitment."
episodes.title: A Man, a Plan and a Gal: Julia

episodes.synopsis: When Roz introduces her pretty-boy boyfriend, Barry, Frasier and Niles suspect he's gay. Roz is appalled by their accusations and insists otherwise.
episodes.title: The Doctor Is Out

episodes.synopsis: While out shopping for new office furniture, Frasier runs into his old babysitter, Ronee, whom he had a mad crush on as a kid.
episodes.title: The Babysitter

episodes.synopsis: Roz grows concerned that Frasier is in a dating slump and tries to set him up with her friend, but Frasier doesn't find her attractive.
episodes.title: The Placeholder

episodes.synopsis: Frasier overhears Ronee make a date with another man and informs Martin, who accuses him of eavesdropping.
episodes.title: I'm Listening

episodes.synopsis: Maris calls Niles at work in a panic, asking him to meet her for lunch. He later reports that she is stuck in a bad relationship with a polo player.
episodes.title: Maris Returns

episodes.synopsis: Maris is arrested for murdering her Argentinean boyfriend and the police question Niles about his lunch with her that morning.
episodes.title: Murder Most Maris

episodes.synopsis: Lilith is in town for a one-day conference and tries to connect with Frasier, but they keep missing each other.
episodes.title: Guns N' Neuroses

episodes.synopsis: Seattle is fascinated with Maris's murder case and Niles emerges as a local celebrity. Frasier grows jealous of his brother's sudden notoriety.
episodes.title: Sea Bee Jeebies

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's excitement about his son's arrival is diminished when Frederick shows up in shocking goth attire donning all black, chains and dark makeup.
episodes.title: High Holidays

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and his co-workers compete in a KACL weight-loss charity event against a rival station for a free trip to Las Vegas.
episodes.title: Frasier-Lite

episodes.synopsis: Martin finds an insurance payment in his pocket that he forgot to mail for Frasier months ago. Frasier panics when he realizes his policy is canceled.
episodes.title: The Ann Who Came to Dinner

episodes.synopsis: When Frasier arrives home after a bad day, he overhears Martin plan for a trip to the mountains and mistakenly believes Martin is inviting him.
episodes.title: Freudian Sleep

episodes.synopsis: When Roz can't score tickets to a sold-out kids' show starring Frasier's "ex," Nanny G, he agrees to pull some strings for her.
episodes.title: Caught in the Act

episodes.synopsis: Martin sneaks up behind Frasier and yells, "Boo!" Though Frasier knows Martin enjoys practical jokes, he doesn't appreciate being surprised that way.
episodes.title: Boo!

episodes.synopsis: A caller phones Frasier's radio show to report she's been stealing things she doesn't even want, simply for the thrill of getting away with it.
episodes.title: Coots and Ladders

episodes.synopsis: A couple named Brad and Cindy from Lamaze class "guilt" Niles and Daphne into hiring a doula named Harvest to assist Daphne during labor.
episodes.title: Match Game

episodes.synopsis: Frasier can't stop thinking about his matchmaker, Charlotte. He's drawn to her, even though he knows she's dating another man.
episodes.title: Miss Right Now

episodes.synopsis: Determined to win Charlotte's heart, Frasier plots his strategy for wooing her away from her boyfriend, Frank.
episodes.title: And Frasier Makes Three

episodes.synopsis: Over coffee with Roz, Frasier confesses that he spent the previous night with Charlotte. Roz introduces Frasier to her stripper friend, Amber Licious.
episodes.title: Detour

episodes.synopsis: While preparing a family dinner, Frasier picks up a cheese crock, and his mind is flooded with memories.
episodes.title: Crock Tales

episodes.synopsis: During a flight, Frasier strikes up a conversation with a fellow passenger and recalls the eventful few weeks he's just had.
episodes.title: Goodnight, Seattle: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Daphne and Niles burst into the office of a young veterinarian to see if he can extricate Martin and Ronee's wedding rings from Eddie's stomach.
episodes.title: Goodnight, Seattle: Part 2
